chunk: PCI DSS 4_0_1 Requirement Control 9.4.1 Defined Approach Requirements: All media with cardholder data is physically secured. Customized Approach Objective: Media with cardholder data cannot be accessed by unauthorized personnel. Guidance: Purpose: If stored in a non-secured facility, backups containing cardholder data may easily be lost, stolen, or copied for malicious intent. Good Practice: For secure storage of backup media, a good practice is to store media in an off-site facility, such as an alternate or backup site or commercial storage facility.
requirement: All media with cardholder data is physically secured.
